id: playbooks/spec-analyst/entrypoint
description: Requirements analysis and project scoping workflow
run_defaults:
  dry_run: true
  timeout_seconds: 300
steps:
  - id: analyze_requirements
    description: Elicit and document comprehensive requirements
  - id: create_user_stories
    description: Generate user stories with acceptance criteria
  - id: validate_completeness
    description: Ensure SMART criteria compliance

id: playbooks/spec-planner/entrypoint
description: Implementation planning and task breakdown workflow
run_defaults:
  dry_run: true
  timeout_seconds: 300
steps:
  - id: break_down_tasks
    description: Decompose architecture into atomic tasks
  - id: identify_dependencies
    description: Map task dependencies and sequencing
  - id: estimate_effort
    description: Estimate complexity and timeline

id: playbooks/spec-developer/entrypoint
description: Feature implementation and code development workflow
run_defaults:
  dry_run: true
  timeout_seconds: 300
steps:
  - id: implement_feature
    description: Write clean, tested code following specifications
  - id: handle_errors
    description: Implement comprehensive error handling
  - id: write_tests
    description: Create unit tests with high coverage

id: playbooks/spec-architect/entrypoint
description: System architecture design and technology selection
run_defaults:
  dry_run: true
  timeout_seconds: 600
steps:
  - id: design_system
    description: Create comprehensive architectural design
  - id: select_technology
    description: Evaluate and recommend technology stack
  - id: document_architecture
    description: Generate C4 diagrams and specifications

id: playbooks/spec-orchestrator/entrypoint
description: Multi-phase workflow coordination and quality gate management
run_defaults:
  dry_run: true
  timeout_seconds: 600
steps:
  - id: design_workflow
    description: Create three-phase development workflow
  - id: define_quality_gates
    description: Establish quality criteria and thresholds
  - id: track_progress
    description: Monitor and report workflow progress

id: playbooks/spec-reviewer/entrypoint
description: Comprehensive code review and quality assurance
run_defaults:
  dry_run: true
  timeout_seconds: 300
steps:
  - id: review_code
    description: Assess quality, security, and performance
  - id: run_linters
    description: Execute automated quality checks
  - id: provide_feedback
    description: Generate actionable improvement recommendations

id: playbooks/spec-tester/entrypoint
description: Comprehensive testing strategy and execution
run_defaults:
  dry_run: true
  timeout_seconds: 300
steps:
  - id: design_tests
    description: Create test suite following testing pyramid
  - id: execute_tests
    description: Run unit, integration, and E2E tests
  - id: validate_coverage
    description: Ensure >80% code coverage

id: playbooks/ui-engineer/entrypoint
description: Frontend development and UI component creation
run_defaults:
  dry_run: true
  timeout_seconds: 300
steps:
  - id: design_component
    description: Create responsive, accessible UI components
  - id: implement_state
    description: Set up state management and data flow
  - id: optimize_performance
    description: Ensure performance and bundle optimization

id: playbooks/backend-typescript-architect/entrypoint
description: Backend TypeScript architecture and implementation
run_defaults:
  dry_run: true
  timeout_seconds: 300
steps:
  - id: design_api
    description: Design RESTful/GraphQL API endpoints
  - id: implement_backend
    description: Implement with clean architecture patterns
  - id: secure_system
    description: Apply OWASP security best practices

id: playbooks/python-backend-engineer/entrypoint
description: Python backend development with modern tooling
run_defaults:
  dry_run: true
  timeout_seconds: 300
steps:
  - id: setup_project
    description: Initialize with uv and proper structure
  - id: implement_api
    description: Create FastAPI/Django endpoints
  - id: test_implementation
    description: Write comprehensive pytest suites

id: playbooks/senior-code-reviewer/entrypoint
description: Senior-level fullstack code review
run_defaults:
  dry_run: true

steps:
  - id: analyze_context
    description: Understand codebase architecture

    description: Generate prioritized improvement report
